divs: sighting details4-25-2013 i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette and noticed a red\orange light in the north east sky just above the tree tops. at first i thought it was airplane lights then realized there were no white lights and the light was not blinking. i thought maybe it was a drone since dobbins air force base is in the direction it came from but drones make noise. i ran inside to grab my binoculars and got a clear view of it. all i can type is, wow. as it continued south west the light just faded away. an oval shape with a matte like exterior that reflected the red\orange just a little. the light underneath was at the front of the of it. the flight path was straight and steady. it took about one or two minutes to travel from where i first saw it till the light faded out . . . no sound at all.
Summary: A red/orange light over tree tops heading SW, no sound, oval shaped . . wow
trends: There has been one other sighting in Powder Springs
There were no other sightings in Powder Springs on or around April 25th 2013
